overview: Sibila leaves Constantinople for Naraío to spend his last days consumed by melancholy due to the evil of love produced by his twin brother Silván. Starting from one of the multiple narratives that in a syncopated way follow one another and interpolate in the story of Álvaro Cunqueiro "El Caballero", we recreate a small story through a refined aesthetic and based on the ellipsis to counteract the obvious vacui horror that characterizes his work .
title: Sibila
